SafeVariableAssignment module

class SafeVariableAssignment.SafeVariableAssignment[source]

Bases: object

Handles the safe assignment of variables for Z3 solver scripts, ensuring that variables are declared and assigned in a format compatible with Z3 solvers.

static safe_variable_assignment(assignation_str, solver_name)[source]

Splits a string of variable assignments, ensures correct format, and prepares them for inclusion in a Z3 solver script.

Parameters:

  • assignation_str (str) – A string containing variable assignments separated by ‘&’.

  • solver_name (str) – The name of the solver, used to prefix global variables.

Returns:

A tuple containing two strings, the first is the Z3 compatible variable declarations and assignments, the second is a list of global variable declarations.

Return type:

tuple[str, list[str]]
